title: Star Wars - Yoda Stories (14.02.1997) (Eng) (v1.0)
description:
This is the very first and most widespread version of the game from LucasArts.
On pirated discs and compilations, it was most often delivered with Patch 6 preinstalled.
The Star Wars - Yoda Stories & Making Magic CD was recorded on 15.02.1997.

title: Star Wars - Yoda Stories (14.02.1997) (Eng) (v1.0) (Patch v6)
description:
This is the first version of the game with Patch 6 from LucasArts.
Fixed all found errors of the DTA file,
but the EXE file is still old.

title: Star Wars - Yoda Stories (18.02.1997) (Eng) (v1.1)
description:
The rarest version of the English-language game from LucasArts. Compared to the first version, it has some fixes.
The files were modified on 18.02.1997.

title: Star Wars - Yoda Stories (18.02.1997) (Eng) (Demo)
description:
Demo version of the v1.1 game released on 18.02.1997.
There is only one mission available on planet Neshtab.

title: Star Wars - Yoda Stories (10.08.1998) (Eng) (v1.2) (Patch v6)
description:
This is the best version of the game from LucasArts, however, it has received little distribution.
It contains all the fixes from Patch 6, but the EXE file is also improved.
Star Wars - Yoda Stories & Behind The Magic - Vehicles Special Edition was recorded on 10.08.1998.

title: Star Wars - Yoda Stories (07.05.1997) (Fra)
description:
French version of Yoda Stories from Ubi Soft.
In terms of the number of fixes it does not reach Patch 6.
The disc was recorded on 07.05.1997.

title: Star Wars - Yoda Stories (22.05.1997) (Spa)
description:
Spanish version of Yoda Stories from ERBE Software.
In terms of the number of fixes it does not reach Patch 6.
The disc was recorded on 22.05.1997.

title: Star Wars - Yoda Stories (19.06.1997) (Bra)
description:
Brazil version of Yoda Stories from BraSoft.
In terms of the number of fixes it does not reach Patch 6.
The disc was recorded 19.06.1997.

title: Star Wars - Yoda Stories (24.06.1997) (Ger)
description:
German version of Yoda Stories from FunSoft.
In terms of the number of fixes it does not reach Patch 6.
The disc was recorded 24.06.1997.

title: Star Wars - Yoda Stories (11.03.1998) (Ita)
description:
Italian version of Yoda Stories from C.T.O.
In terms of the number of fixes it does not reach Patch 6.
The disc was recorded on 11.03.1998.
This is probably not the first release of the game in Italian.

title: Star Wars - Yoda Stories (13.12.2001) (T-Spa_Selva Translators)
description:
Spanish version of Yoda Stories with a slightly modified EXE file.
"Selva Translators" left their signature in the About window.
In terms of the number of corrections, it does not reach Patch 6.

title: Star Wars - Yoda Stories (12.11.2006) (T-Rus_PRO)
description:
The first version of the translation of Yoda Stories into Russian.
The technology available at the time did not make it perfect.
Despite the fact that the last DAT file is taken as a basis,
It comes with 2 weird changes that could potentially break the game.
EXE file is from the first version. Translation date: 19.08.2006.
